gradle/org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl/Dependencies

Dependencies

@Incubating
interface Dependencies(source)

Universal APIs that are available for all dependencies blocks.

Since

7.6

See also

<a href="https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/implementing_gradle_plugins_binary.html#custom_dependencies_blocks">Creating custom dependencies blocks.</a>
